variable.name: subjid
variable.comment: Non-enumerated value domain. Deidentified ID where the first two digits denote the origination site of the samples; site key: Marshfield Clinic=16; Vanderbilt University=27; Group Health Cooperative=38; Mayo Clinic=49; Northwestern University=52. External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 2181644 (Public ID) NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus.

variable.name: case_control
variable.comment: External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 2529082 (Public ID) NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus. 0=Case; 1=Control.

variable.name: sex
variable.comment: External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 2200604 (Public ID) NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus. F=Female; M=Male; U=Unknown.

variable.name: decade_birth
variable.comment: Group patients born prior to 1920 (>=89 years of age) into one group. External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 3018429 (Public ID) NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus.

variable.name: race
variable.comment: External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 106 (Public ID) NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus. 0=Black or African American; 1=American Indian or Alaska Native; 2=Asian; 3=White; 4=Native Hawaiian or other Pacific Islander; 5=Other; 6=Unknown.
variable.value: Native Hawaiian or other Pacific Islander

variable.name: age_observation_max_bp
variable.description: Age when maximum blood pressure is recorded.

variable.name: systolic_blood_pressure_max
variable.description: The pressure of the blood against the artery walls during systole (the contraction phase) - max value.
variable.comment: Submit the maximum value. For both cases and controls. External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 2182882 (Public ID) NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus.

variable.name: diastolic_blood_pressure_max
variable.description: The pressure of the blood against the artery walls during diastole (the relaxation phase) - max value.
variable.comment: Submit the maximun value that corresponds to the max SBP. For both cases and controls. External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 2182885 (Public ID) NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus.

variable.name: age_observation_median_bp
variable.description: Age when median blood pressure is recorded.

variable.name: systolic_blood_pressure_median
variable.description: The pressure of the blood against the artery walls during systole (the contraction phase) - median value.
variable.comment: Submit the median value. For both cases and controls. External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 2004289 (Public ID) NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus.

variable.name: diastolic_blood_pressure_median
variable.description: The pressure of the blood against the artery walls during diastole (the relaxation phase) - median value.
variable.comment: Submit the value that corresponds to the median SBP. For both cases and controls. External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 2004291 (Public ID) NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d(July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus.

variable.name: smoking_status
variable.description: The classification of smoking status based on whether an adult has never smoked, or ever smoked, the latter consisiting of current smokers and former smokers.
variable.comment: External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 2183382 (Public ID) NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus. 1=Never Smoker; 2=Former Smoker; 3=Some Days Smoker; 4=Every Day Smoker; 5=Current Smoker.
variable.value: Current Smoker, Every Day Smoker, or Some Day Smoker

variable.name: drug_class
variable.description: The Class of drug listed in study algorithm.
variable.comment: Submit the values that are closest to the time when the case is considered a qualified subject. Hydralazine; Renin antagonist; Central alpha agonist; ACEI/ARB; Aldosterone antagonist; Diuretic; Alpha antagonist; Non-dihydro CCB; Dihydro CCB; Beta Blocker; Thiazide/BB; Thiazide/ACEI ARB; Thiazide/aldosterone antagonist; Thiazide/Renin antagonist.
